title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5200.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5200.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

Many emergencies require immediate response from an emergency
service provider, whether police, fire, or emergency medical service. This need
requires that 911 dispatch facilities must be able to dispatch any and all of
such providers to ensure the highest level of service and protection to the
community. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5200.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
